Package gaffer.operation

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    GetElementsOperation<SEED_TYPE,RETURN_TYPE>
    A GetElementsOperation defines a seeded get operation to be processed on a graph.
    GetIterableElementsOperation<SEED_TYPE,RETURN_TYPE>
    A GetIterableElementsOperation defines a seeded get operation to be processed on a graph, resulting in an Iterable of Element objects.
    GetIterableOperation<SEED_TYPE,RETURN_TYPE>
    A GetIterableOperation defines a seeded get operation to be processed on a graph.
    GetOperation<SEED_TYPE,RETURN_TYPE>
    A GetOperation defines a seeded get operation to be processed on a graph.
    Operation<INPUT,OUTPUT>
    An Operation defines an operation to be processed on a graph.
    Validatable<OUTPUT>
    A Validatable operation defines an operation with an iterable of Elements that can optionally be validated before being processed.
    VoidInput<OUTPUT>
    An VoidInput operation has no input.
    VoidOutput<INPUT>
    An VoidOutput operation has no output.

    OperationChain<OUT>
    An OperationChain holds a list of Operations that are chained together - ie.
    OperationChain.Builder
    A Builder is a type safe way of building an OperationChain.
    OperationChain.TypedBuilder<OUT>  
    OperationChain.TypelessBuilder  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    GetOperation.IncludeEdgeType
    A IncludeEdgeType defines whether Edges used in the operation should be directed.
    GetOperation.IncludeIncomingOutgoingType
    A IncludeIncomingOutgoingType defines the direction of the Edges during the operation.
    GetOperation.SeedMatchingType
    A SeedMatchingType defines how the seeds in the operation should be matched.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    OperationException
    An OperationException is thrown when an operation fails.
